item.title: California Democrat drops out of governor's race to run for a different role
item.description: California's lieutenant governor is dropping out of the governor's race and instead mounting a bid for the role of Golden State treasurer

item.title: Former Georgia Lt. Gov. Geoff Duncan floats possible run for office after switching to Democratic Party
item.description: Former Georgia Lt. Gov. Geoff Duncan said he is considering a run for higher office as a Democrat after announcing he was leaving the Republican Party...
